Introduction

Onda is a South Korean dancer and singer under Yue Hua Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group EVERGLOW.

In 2017, Onda participated in the Mnet' survival show, Idol School, but was eliminated in episode 4 after ranking 40th place.

On February 20, 2019, a teaser video was posted on Stone Music Entertainment's YouTube channel, revealing her, under the stage name Onda, as a member of the girl group EVERGLOW. She made her debut with them on March 18, 2019 with the release of their first digital single "Arrival of Everglow", and its title song "Bon Bon Chocolat".
